reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Education sector capacity building, Visit of funcionaries of education of Miranda State Venezuela to Finland

description.narrative: Funcionaries of education of the Miranda State Juan Maragall and Adriana D?Elia visit Finland on 12-16 March 2012. In 2010 Miranda was the first Venezuelan state to participate in the PISA evaluation. Familiarization with the Finnish educational system fro m day care centers to upper secondary schools brings additional value to developing education in the state. The visit is carried out in coordination with the visit of the Minister of Education of the Dominican Republic Josefina Pimentel as well as Vice Min isters Minerva Vincent and Victor Sanchez to Finland. The visit program includes visits in different schools at the Ministry of Education and Culture in the Finnish National Board of Education in the Department of Teacher Education of the University of Hel sinki meeting with Minister of Education Jukka Gustafsson as well as meetings with the Trade Union of Education in Finland and companies in the education sector.
